about_the_game:
The game is a third-person shooter (TPS) mechanized action game set in Seoul, offering a unique experience that combines intense combat with strategic depth. The game's world is set in a futuristic Seoul filled with highly advanced technology and mechanized robots. Key features of the game include

Highly customizable robot parts system: Players can create unique robots by combining parts from nine different areas. Each of these parts has unique functions and abilities, allowing players to customize their robot to suit their fighting style and strategy. This ensures diversity in gameplay and allows each player to dominate the battlefield in a unique way.

Interact with a wide variety of characters: There are 260 compelling characters to meet across Seoul, each with their own unique background and skills. They not only enrich the game's world, but also play an important role in enhancing the player's combat power as a pilot or operator. Interacting with each character makes the game's story more interesting and helps players connect more deeply with the city of Seoul.

Apartment defense and capture mechanics: One of the important elements of the game is the defense and capture of apartments in large complexes in Seoul. These missions go beyond simple combat and require strategic thinking and planning. Players can expand their territory and compete for influence with other players, establishing themselves as the rulers of the city.

Compete in the Arena: Players can compete against other players in the Arena in 1v1, 2v2, or deathmatch formats. These matches test players' combat skills and give them the opportunity to build their reputation in the game. Each match requires tense combat and strategic skills, and victory brings significant rewards and fame.

Take on the role of CEO of the Management Office: In this game, players take on the important role of organizing and managing the game world as the CEO of the Management Office. In this position, players are responsible for resource management, strategic decisions, and battlefield operations, and play a central role in the game's progression.

The game's appeal goes beyond simple action and combat, allowing players to immerse themselves in the city of Seoul and the various events that take place within it. Unique characters, customizable robots, and strategic gameplay give players a new and challenging experience every time. The game is set in the future of a city called Seoul, offering a unique opportunity to explore a variety of combat scenarios and strategic depth.
